item.title: Turbocharge Your Code Coverage With Xdebug
item.description: In the dynamic world of Laravel development, ensuring your code is well-tested isn’t just good practice; it’s essential for creating robust applications. Code coverage serves as a critical metric to assess the extent to which your tests cover your codebase.
